His Saga is the entrepreneurial creation myth writ large: Steve Jobs cofounded Apple in his parents' garage in 1976, was fousted in 1985, returned to rescue it from near bankruptcy in 1997, and by the time he died, in October 2011, hd built it into the world's most valuable company.
